code:
stateDiagram-v2
  [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] --> Initiator: app(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
  state Initiator {IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> InterestsSent: send(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    InterestsSent --> RangeSent: recv(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    RangeSent --> RangeRecv: recv(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    RangeRecv --> RangeSent: send(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    RangeRecv --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]: app(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  }
  [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> Responder: app(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
  state Responder {IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> InterestsRecvd: recv(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    InterestsRecvd --> RangeWait: send(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    RangeWait --> RangeReply: recv(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    RangeReply --> RangeWait: send(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    RangeWait --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]: recv(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
  }
  Initiator --> SyncingValues
  Responder --> SyncingValues
  SynchingValues --> Synchronized: app(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic), send(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
  Synchronized --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]: recv(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
